Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Abantu bakubuza ngeYure. Yithi wena: “Ulwazi ngayo lukuAllâh kuphela, kanti yintoni na eya kunenza niqonde? Mhlawumbi iYure sele ikufuphi.”
Inene uAllâh Ubaqalekisile abangakholwayo yaye Ubalungiselele uMlilo odwanguzayo (isiHogo)
Apho baya kuhlala ngonaphakade kwaye apho abayi kufumana mkhuseli bengayi kufumana namncedi
NgeMini apho ubuso babo buya kujingiswa phezu koMlilo, baya kuthi: “Oh, akwaba Sasimthobele uAllâh, Sathobela noMthunywa (uMuhammad)
Kananjalo baya kuthi: “Nkosi yethu, inene thina sathobela abaphathi bethu nezinxibamxhaga zethu, baza basilahlekisa eNdleleni (elungileyo)
Hini na nina bakholwayo, ningabi njengabo bakhubekisa uMûsâ, ke kaloku uAllâh Wamenza msulwa koko babekuthetha ngaye. Kananjalo yena (uMûsâ) phambi koAllâh ungoqaqambileyo
Hini na nina bakholwayo, Moyikeni uAllâh nithethe ilizwi elibubulungisa
Yena (uAllâh) Uya kuzenza ntle izenzo zenu, Anixolele nezono zenu. Nabani na lowo uthobela uAllâh noMthunywa waKhe, uzuze eyona mpumelelo inkulu

Inene Thina Sanika amazulu nomhlaba neentaba uxanduva (lokunonophela indalo nokufundisa ukuthobela uAllâh) kodwa zala ukuluthabatha, zoyika kodwa yena umntu (waluthabatha). Inene yena waye waswela ubulungisa waba nobudenge

Khona ukuze uAllâh Ohlwaye abahanahanisi, abangamadoda nabasetyhini, namadoda nabasetyhini abangabakhonzi bezithixo, Aze uAllâh Amkele inguquko kumakholwa namakholwakazi Yaye uAllâh nguMxoleli, uSozinceba
